content: protect your table with these lovely c2c coasters they are crocheted in rainbow cotton 8/4 which is available in a large variety of colors perfect for interior design and decor a trendy leather strap adds the finishing touch to the coasters happy crocheting materials - crochet hook 3 mm / us 2 5 - rainbow cotton 8/4 3 work with 2 strands or use 1 strand of rainbow cotton 8/8 4 - leather strap 14 mm - leather hole punch optional gauge approx 8 1⁄2 squares x 8 1⁄2 squares = 4x4 inch usage approx 15g per piece measurements approx 3 7 x 3 7 inch abbreviations **chain** chain stitch **st** stitch es **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet increase increase **decrease** decrease 1 https //hobbii com/c2c-coasters utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=c2c-coasters&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow84&utm_term=swr 3 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow84&utm_term=swr 4 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-8 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow88&utm_term=swr
